scripts.css-lint: rm -f output.css; find ./css  -name '*.css' -type f -exec cat {} \; > output.css; node node_modules/.bin/csslint --config=.csslint  --quiet ./output.css; rm -f output.css;
scripts.test: echo '-- HTML --';npm run html; echo '-- CSS Purify --'; npm run css-purify; echo '-- CSS Lint --'; npm run css-lint; echo '-- JS --'; npm run js
